import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./BotonDeDudas.scss"; const BotonDeDudas = () => { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const accordionData = { title: "¿Tienes dudas?", content: ( <>
Enviar correo
+57 - 601- 319 - 8300
+57 - 8000 - 910122
Preguntas frecuentes
), }; const { title, content } = accordionData; return (
setIsActive(!isActive)} >
{title}
{isActive ? ( ) : ( )}
{isActive &&
{content}
}
); }; export default BotonDeDudas;
